listitem.para: Who cares about your favourite functional language?

You should not care because it gives rise to a conflict of interest.
Your employer is not interested in entertaining your fantasies and you shouldn't expect otherwise.
Your employer is interested in solving problems efficiently and effectively.
Turns out, functional programming happens to kick serious arse when it comes to this objective!
You wish to entertain professional programming practices. Does your patsy?

sect2.title: How do I entertain professional programming practices?

listitem.para: Let us not give emphasis to programming languages — they are irrelevant to the common interest.
Let us focus on the functional programming thesis itself and what it provides.
